AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: law enforcement agency involved in border surveillance, control, and immigration inspections, with agents operating on roving patrol and making stops based on reasonable suspicion; its agents had recently apprehended illegal alien smugglers at or near the location of a specific stop and were entitled to question occupants about their citizenship and immigration status after a stop. Agents Stanley Pruszenski and Alfred Baron stopped a pickup truck camper on Interstate Highway 35 due to suspicious behavior, observing passengers attempting to conceal themselves and having unkempt appearances.
